title: Hayward H-Series Low NOx — Error Codes

errors.title: Blower Vacuum Switch closed
errors.meaning: Blower vacuum switch is detected closed when it should not be.
errors.fix: Check blower vacuum switch wiring and tubing for blockage or sticking. Replace switch if necessary.

errors.title: Blower Vacuum Switch open
errors.meaning: Blower vacuum switch is detected open when it should be closed.
errors.fix: Check blower operation, hose integrity, and switch continuity.

errors.title: Bad board or secondary high voltage fault
errors.meaning: The control board has failed or detected a secondary high-voltage fault.
errors.fix: Inspect wiring and voltage; replace control board if fault persists.

errors.title: Communication Error
errors.meaning: Communication error between Control Module and Display Interface Assembly.
errors.fix: Inspect communication cable for continuity and corrosion. Replace board or display as needed.

errors.title: Flame present with Gas Valve not energized
errors.meaning: Flame signal detected when gas valve is not energized.
errors.fix: Inspect flame sensor and gas valve operation; replace ignition control if issue repeats.

errors.title: Maximum return water temperature exceeded
errors.meaning: Return water exceeded maximum safe temperature and/or rapid rise detected.
errors.fix: Check for restricted water flow or faulty temperature sensor.

errors.title: Ignition Failure
errors.meaning: Ignition sequence failed — flame was not established.
errors.fix: Inspect igniter, gas supply, and ignition control. Verify 120 VAC to igniter.

errors.title: Igniter Circuit Open
errors.meaning: Igniter circuit is open or not connected.
errors.fix: Check igniter continuity. Replace igniter if open.

errors.title: Pressure/Limit Switch Fault
errors.meaning: Water Pressure Switch, Vent Pressure Switch, or Temperature Limit Switch fault.
errors.fix: Check water flow, verify pressure switch continuity, and inspect limit switches.

errors.title: Polarity/Voltage Fault
errors.meaning: Voltage polarity reversed or low voltage detected.
errors.fix: Check wiring polarity and supply voltage. Correct as necessary.
